title: Can't deselect "autojoin on startup" in club chat.  It's faded.  Is there a way?
body:
Title.  Just wondering if there is a way to do so.  Joined the club to help an IRL friend with tag creation.

Thanks^^

-LostFr0st

replies.body: I don't believe the option to toggle auto-join is available.  Currently, the only major option you can select is your preferred club chat room.  I don't have an eta on when this will be a thing, but I hope that helps clear things up!

I gotchu, thanks^^

Was wondering why it was greyed out and checkmarked if I couldn't change it, but if its an eventually that's cool.
